Edited September 10, 2015 by Combatsmithen

Blender is free software! Why do you think you have to buy it?

Of course you can use any 3D modelling software you like (3ds Max, Cinema4D, etc.). Just make sure it can export models in a file format Unity can load.

Also have a look at this link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE

It tells you everything you want to know.
